name: Blade
description: A member of the Stellaron Hunters and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade. He pledges loyalty to Destiny's Slave and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

name: Chiaki
description: DaGlitch's wife.Not one and only tho.

name: Almir
description: Almir Listo, Global Brand Director at Starbreeze Entertainment, with a 12-year career in game development. Known for contributions to titles like PAYDAY, Dead by Daylight, Psychonauts 2, and Old World. Specializes in community-building through game creation, also sharing game development knowledge at schools. Latest achievement: PAYDAY 3, released in 2023, received accolades at Gamescom.

name: Korekiyo
description: Korekiyo Shinguji is the ''Ultimate Anthropologist´´ who posses knowledge of cultures all around the world, also being a Serial Killer with split personlaity,who kills women adecuate to be, in his words, ''His sister's friends'', being this one already dead.In his other personality he resembles his sister, wearing lipstick and eyeshadow under his mask.

name: Saitama
description: Just a hero for fun, he is bald and strongest

name: King
description: I'm the strongest man on earth. The S-Class Rank 7 hero, King. Do you know that!?

name: Tatsumaki
description: Tatsumaki is a powerful character known for her small stature and immense psychic abilities. She possesses extraordinary telekinetic powers, capable of lifting and manipulating large objects with ease. Despite her appearance, she exudes confidence and often displays a haughty demeanor. Her strength and skill make her a formidable force to be reckoned with.
